name: Ninfa's Green Tomato Salsa
author: Jamison7117
summary: A famous green salsa recipe in Houston. Guaranteed to be loved by all.
ingredients: 4  fresh tomatillos - husked, rinsed, and chopped
directions: Stir tomatoes, tomatillos, jalapeno pepper, and garlic together in a saucepan; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and cook at a simmer until the tomatoes and tomatillos soften, 10 to 15 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and let tomato mixture cool slightly
Pour cooled tomato mixture into a blender pitcher; add avocado slices, cilantro, and salt
Blend the mixture until smooth; transfer to a bowl
Stir sour cream into the blended mixture until smooth
